bibl.title: Posidippean and Callimachean Queries.
bibl.note: 1. Identification of Eleusis (Alexandrian suburb or Theran anchorage?) in P. Mil. Vogl. VIII, 309, col. iv, 3. - 2. The catalogue of Callimachus' literary enemies in Schol. Flor. ad fr. 1.1 Pf. (lines 3-8). - 3. Language and style in Suppl. Hell. 978 resemble language and style (and content) of the collected λιθικά of P. Mil. Vogl. VIII, 309, coll. i, 1 - iv, 6.
bibl.seg: LEHNUS Luigi, Posidippean and Callimachean Queries.

1. Identification of Eleusis (Alexandrian suburb or Theran anchorage?) in P. Mil. Vogl. VIII, 309, col. iv, 3. - 2. The catalogue of Callimachus' literary enemies in Schol. Flor. ad fr. 1.1 Pf. (lines 3-8). - 3. Language and style in Suppl. Hell. 978 resemble language and style (and content) of the collected λιθικά of P. Mil. Vogl. VIII, 309, coll. i, 1 - iv, 6.
